item.description:
It's ronin story game time. The Mountain Witch is a game centered around a small party of ronin on a journey to confront the mysterious Mountain Witch and her endless minons. But each swordsman carries a dark secret that threatens to tear the group apart.

This is the fifth in a series of one-shot indie RPG experiences to
be offered monthly over the course of 2010. Each month will feature a
different GM running a new game. This month's GM will be our own David Starner.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be downstairs in the gameplay area, probably in a remote corner.
item.name: June One-Shot - the Mountain Witch
